settings.gift_wrap_text: Do you want a gift wrap?

settings.title: Matt Chistopherson
settings.q1: Club DJ over 13 years in the industry
settings.q2: CDJ-2000-Nexus. You can't deny the ease of digital technology now a days. This unit gives you the use of digital files and without your face buried in a computer and interacting with the crowd

settings.title: Tico Correa
settings.q1: My involvement with music is that I DJ 'ed and worked with a rental company doing sound & lighting.
settings.q2: My favorite pieces of gear would be mostly Pioneer products, some CDJ2000s and the DJM900 SRT
settings.q3: There is too much gear to put down. I do own a lot of speakers, lights, and gear to make the party happen.
settings.q4: Some of my hobbies are: to workout (Crossfit), play baseball, play poker, and do outdoor activities.

settings.title: Jay Wilson
settings.q1: Before I was involved with PSSL, I played the drums in a punk rock band called Rats With Tats, and now I run a recording studio called Angry Rooster Studios.
settings.q2: My favorite piece of gear that PSSL sells is the Shure SM-57. Nothing compares to the durability, quality, and price point that this mic offers.
settings.q3: I own a truckload of SM-57s, an SM-52 Beta, an AKG-414, an MXL890, and a variety of other microphones. I own a Saffire Pro 40, and a ProFire 2626 for my interfaces, and a variety of other assorted studio equipment.
settings.q4: I play in eSports tournaments semi-professionally, and do assorted audio and video projects for small eSports companies.

settings.title: Akil Batiste
settings.q1: I've always loved music. Before working at PSSL I made Hip Hop instrumentals and remixes. I pride myself on using samples only. I put music out on Soundcloud and Bandcamp under the alias S0ul Unreal. Check me out!
settings.q2: My favorite piece of gear that PSSL sells would have to be the AKG-C414. When I was in Cal State Chico’s audio engineering program, that was my go to mic for almost everything. I love it.
settings.q3: Right now I have a Komplete Audio interface with M-Audio BX8 studio monitors. I also have an Alesis QX25 midi keyboard. It's a basic set up, but it gets the job done.
settings.q4: My main hobby is listening/digging for obscure or new music. It’s an everyday thing. I like to create music whenever it feels right as well. I never rush the process though. I also love to play video games on my Xbox. Pretty soon I'll be making that transition to PS4!

settings.title: Tod Conover
settings.q1: Audio Engineer, DJ, guitar/keys/vocals, mentor and teacher.
settings.q2: XDJ-RX2. Its Like your own condensed pair of CDJ's
settings.q3: CDJ's, Genelec monitors, rack gear (compressors, eqs, guitar fx, vocals fx), Jackson guitars, 88 keylab.
settings.q4: Skateboarding, snowboarding and hanging with my dog.

settings.title: Anthony Rodriguez
settings.q1: Ive been involved with music for 28 years. I started out as a DJ and now I’m involved recording and live mixing for bands.
settings.q2: I would have to say the BassBoss ZV28 Dual 18 in powered subwoofers, I’m a total bass head and love the sound of those.
settings.q3: I have a whole sound setup including 4 bass cabinets and 4 top cabinets. I am currently running a rack with the majority of products in it being Behringer. It contains Amps, a Crossover, Maximizer, Compressor/Limiter/Gate, Equalizer. I also have a full setup for a band including Drums, Bass and Electric Guitars and a Keyboard as well.
settings.q4: I love to go to Six Flags Magic Mountain on my days off!!

settings.title: Raymundo Medina
settings.q1: I recorded and mixed music for a while. I currently do sound editing and sound design for film. I was also DJ. I still DJ every now and then. Also, I have a bachelor’s degree in audio engineering
settings.q2: The Pioneer CDJ-2000 NXS2 and the Pioneer DJM-750 mixer. A set of professional CDJs really make a difference when you’re performing out in a venue.
settings.q3: I own a couple of JBL EON 615’s. I also own a Pioneer DDJ-SR.
settings.q4: Outside of work, you can find me doing some sound work for a film or a trailer.

settings.title: Design and Installation Services
settings.html:
Design and Installation Solutions for Businesses
PSSL Systems Group is a professional team of advisers geared at providing customers with the best in service, solutions, and equipment. With over 38 years of experience in audio, truss, lighting, and installations we pride ourselves in catering to the needs of many business establishments, big or small.

Learn More
Government and Educational Sales
For over 38 years, Pro Sound and Stage Lighting (PSSL) has specialized in providing professional audio/visual solutions to Institutional customers across the globe. With an extensive selection of in-stock solutions for sound, lighting, and video applications, PSSL can deliver the right gear in the time frame your school, business, or government entity.

Learn More
GSA/AFNAF/Federal
PSSL has been providing professional sound, lighting and video equipment to Military and Federal customers since 1976. We offer a large in-stock selection and specialize in both purchase orders as well as Government purchase cards through our AFNAFPO and GSA contracts. We ship products to all of U.S. and its territories bases.

Learn More

settings.heading: USED EQUIPMENT SALE
settings.content: Choose from our extensive selection of PA, DJ and LED lighting equipment and buy factory refurbished or used gear at competitive prices.

settings.heading: FULL-SERVICE OFFER
settings.content:
Leverage the power of our turnkey audiovisual solutions, a wide range of cutting-edge equipment and our passionate team of experts to create a seamless experience that caters to your business needs.


No challenge is too complex for us: Whether you require permanent systems integration solutions or rental equipment for live productions, our highly skilled teams will work with you to tackle your project and bring your vision to life.
settings.content1: Get complete control with our reliable, curated permanent installations. Using state-of-the-art equipment, our experts put the power of technology at work for you!
settings.content2: Dazzle your audience and create memorable moments thanks to our sophisticated audiovisual and entertainment technologies. Everything is possible when it comes to live productions.

settings.content:
Leverage the power of our turnkey audiovisual solutions, a wide range of cutting-edge equipment and our passionate team of experts to create a seamless experience that caters to your business needs.
No challenge is too complex for us: Whether you require permanent systems integration solutions or rental equipment for live productions, our highly skilled teams will work with you to tackle your project and bring your vision to life.

settings.heading: LOCAL & FEDERAL OFFER
settings.content: Over the decades, Pro Sound and Stage Lighting (PSSL) has built a reputation for providing custom and curated audiovisual solutions to local entities and federal institutions. Whether it is sound, lighting, or video, our teams will put their expertise into play to bring your project to life.
settings.content1: PSSL has specialized in providing professional audiovisual solutions to Institutional customers across the globe. With an extensive selection of in-stock solutions for sound, lighting, and video applications, PSSL can deliver the right gear in the time frame for your school, business, or government entity.
settings.content2: PSSL has been providing professional sound, lighting and video equipment to Military and Federal customers since 1976. We offer a large in-stock selection and specialize in both purchase orders as well as Government purchase cards through our AFNAFPO and GSA contracts. We ship products to all of U.S. and its territories bases.

settings.section_description: ProSound and Stage Lighting (PSSL or PSSL.com as we have become to be known) has grown to one of the largest and most respected sources of professional audio and lighting equipment in the United States. We are Professionals who leverage the latest technologies in sound and lighting to deliver increased: speech intelligibility and music fidelity, energy/electricity savings and unlimited color options thru LED sourced lighting, and excitement to any visual or audio application since 1976. Our goal is provide you with professional solutions for your venue or event. You can count on factory trained advisors to assist you in creating a custom set-up and array of products that will work for you.

We recently joined forces with Solotech, a global leader in audiovisual and entertainment technologies. That synergy allows you to benefit from a wider range of expertise, to access even more high-quality equipment and to discover new complementary services.

We specialize in all audio, lighting, truss, and install solutions and we have helped hundreds of clients design and build systems for projects of all sizes. Contact us to start your next system project today.

settings.project_description: Our team of lighting professionals will walk you through the process of selecting the right lighting products to fit your application. We provide the lighting products that will add visual excitement to areas that benefit from illumination and contrast. From a basic lighting design sketch to a fully animated vision of your project, PSSL has design and product options to fit every need and budget.

We provide state-of-the-art audio technologies in high-performance loudspeakers, microphones, and processing to dramatically improve music performance playback. The result is a highly stable platform from which the top quality speaker and amplification components are efficient while yielding higher rates of speech and sound intelligibility - all from a user friendly interface with flexible user options.

Allow our truss certified team to design a custom truss structure or set up just for your needs. Get support for a variety of applications and venues using high quality materials. Use truss for anything from general purpose rigging, ground support, stages, lighting/audio/video display, or structural design.
Get complete control with our reliable, curated permanent installations. Using state-of-the-art equipment, our experts put the power of technology at work for you!
Dazzle your audience and create memorable moments thanks to our sophisticated audiovisual and entertainment technologies. Everything is possible when it comes to live productions.

The audio system has been upgraded in this award-winning venue to ensure an unmatched live entertainment experience for the guests. A powerful and impressive improvement to celebrate the most recognized superstar talent.
Life is Beautiful Music & Art Festival is an annual multidisciplinary festival hosted in Las Vegas. It combines a connective and immersive experience of music, art, comedy, culinary, and more.

Discover Meow Wolf’s permanent installation, Omega Mart, located in Las Vegas. This interactive and mind-bending art experience allows participants to explore an extraordinary supermarket bursting into surreal worlds and unexpected landscapes.

Find out more about Pink’s impressive Beautiful Trauma Tour.
From its size, to the on-stage and in the air movement, this tour was a challenging project.

settings.section_description:
PSSL and Solotech have successfully delivered significant projects to satisfied customers in different industries, ranging from local houses of worship and nightclub entertainment to military bases and major theme parks.  

We will see your project through from start to finish and we will provide the professional audio and lighting equipment you need. No challenge is too complex for us.

settings.content: Our SYSTEMS INTEGRATION team of experts designs, sources, delivers and installs audio, video, lighting, control and collaboration systems tailored to your needs, venues and clients. We provide the solutions you need to make the complicated simple, your every moment more epic, and easier, every time.

We recently joined forces with Solotech, a global leader in audiovisual and entertainment technologies. That synergy allows you to benefit from a wider range of expertise, to access even more high-quality equipment and to discover new complementary services. Learn more about Solotech’s systems integration solutions for an experience that exceeds expectations!

At PSSL, we have the best minds in the industry geared at providing customers with curated solutions that cater to their needs. We pride ourselves on delivering projects of many business establishments, big or small. We thrive on offering our customers the best experience and service, from needs analysis, project management, system design to installation and programming.

settings.project_description:
The Cardinals stadium is one of a kind in the US. This multi-use facility is the first stadium in the country to leverage a complete design-build approach to its sound and video system. 
It's also the first NFL stadium with 4k video capabilities.

The San Diego Symphony Bayside Amphitheater, The Shell, is the unique outdoor experience that awaits performers and spectators.  
It will also be the first permanent open-air performance venue in San Diego.

The audio system has been upgraded in this award-winning venue to ensure an unmatched live entertainment experience for the guests. A powerful and impressive improvement to celebrate the most recognized superstar talent.

Discover Meow Wolf’s permanent installation, Omega Mart, located in Las Vegas. This interactive and mind-bending art experience allows participants to explore an extraordinary supermarket bursting into surreal worlds and unexpected landscapes.

settings.section_description:
PSSL’s alliance with Solotech brings your possibilities to a whole new level as we have added new solutions and services in live productions to our offering! 
If you are looking for the design, planning and flawless execution of your one-off events or entire tours you are at the right place. You now have access to the best entertainment technology and audiovisual specialists along with state-of-the-art equipment, whether it be for a corporate or sporting event, a music festival or even your own private gathering! You can rent or purchase any gear.

We recently joined forces with Solotech, a global leader in audiovisual and entertainment technologies. That synergy allows you to benefit from a wider range of expertise, to access even more high-quality equipment and to discover new complementary services. Learn more about Solotech’s live production solutions and services for an experience that exceeds expectations!

settings.project_description: This huge electronic dance music event is an annual outdoor festival taking place in Miami. It’s the place to be for EDM fans and artists known worldwide.
Life is Beautiful Music & Art Festival is an annual multidisciplinary festival hosted in Las Vegas. It combines a connective and immersive experience of music, art, comedy, culinary, and more.

settings.project_heading: Elton John -  Yellow Brick Road Farewell Tour
settings.project_description: Elton John’s Farewell Yellow Brick Road is the final tour celebrating his career. For three years, the music icon travelled to five continents to the great pleasure of the fans!

Find out more about Pink’s impressive Beautiful Trauma Tour.
From its size, to the on-stage and in the air movement, this tour was a challenging project.

settings.section_description: PSSL and Solotech have successfully delivered significant projects to satisfied customers in different sectors, ranging from corporate events, international tours, Esports tournaments to major festivals across the globe.
